title: How to Be a Good Player on ROBLOX

steps.headline: Improve your control skills.
steps.description: You might be on an obstacle course. This is a good way to practice your controls- You use the WASD or arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump, and you can scroll or use the I and O keys to zoom in and out.

steps.headline: Practice with obstacles.
steps.description: For example There are some rocket launchers that fire multiple rockets with spaces in between. Practice with the admin of a level. Get them to shoot it at you and you stay still...don't lose it.

steps.headline: Hand-to-hand combat: You are under attack by someone.
steps.description: When you get cornered, turn around slashing madly. If you are the attacker, watch out for the attack bust when he's cornered.

steps.headline: DON'T LAG.
steps.description: Roblox lags madly and in the worst case it may crash due to poor servers.

steps.headline: Be nice: It's the best way to get people to respect you.
Help other people.
steps.description: People might want to become your friend more often if you are nice, and helpful. People don't want to be friends with people who say things like "lol, figure it out yourself noob!"

steps.headline: Get KOs: Getting high scores at fighting games can make you a better Robloxian.
steps.description: But don't get many Wipeouts! You could even try to get the famous Bloxxer badge! (No longer obtainable)

steps.headline: Always use Shift-Lock.For straight, consecutive bar jumps, enable Shift-Lock and jump sideways.
Always attack when the tip of the sword is the closest to the enemy
Frequently move back and forth while in combat
Attack from behind the enemy.Always be ready to be attacked from behind.
steps.description: Always go in the first person. If there are kill cams, use them to your advantage to see where the enemy killed you at. Don't blame your teammates; it is rare that they are that bad that you need to blame them for your loss, prevent fighting with them!

text: Improve your control skills. You might be on an obstacle course. This is a good way to practice your controls- You use the WASD or arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump, and you can scroll or use the I and O keys to zoom in and out. Practice with obstacles. For example There are some rocket launchers that fire multiple rockets with spaces in between. Practice with the admin of a level. Get them to shoot it at you and you stay still...don't lose it. Hand-to-hand combat: You are under attack by someone. When you get cornered, turn around slashing madly. If you are the attacker, watch out for the attack bust when he's cornered. DON'T LAG. Roblox lags madly and in the worst case it may crash due to poor servers. Be nice: It's the best way to get people to respect you.  Help other people. People might want to become your friend more often if you are nice, and helpful. People don't want to be friends with people who say things like "lol, figure it out yourself noob!" Get KOs: Getting high scores at fighting games can make you a better Robloxian. But don't get many Wipeouts! You could even try to get the famous Bloxxer badge! (No longer obtainable) Always use Shift-Lock.For straight, consecutive bar jumps, enable Shift-Lock and jump sideways.  Always attack when the tip of the sword is the closest to the enemy  Frequently move back and forth while in combat  Attack from behind the enemy.Always be ready to be attacked from behind. Always go in the first person. If there are kill cams, use them to your advantage to see where the enemy killed you at. Don't blame your teammates; it is rare that they are that bad that you need to blame them for your loss, prevent fighting with them!
